title: BBC Local Live: Updates from London on Tuesday 7 April 2015 - BBC News
summary: paedophile priest case to be reviewed .

documents.title: good evening
text: that 's all from bbc local live for today .
see you back here tomorrow from 08:00 with more news , sport , travel and weather updates from across london .

documents.title: on air
text: on
also , politicians from the three main parties go head-to-head to debate london 's nhs services .
author: BBC London News

documents.title: aljaz bedene backed by greg rusedski
text: slovenia-born aljaz bedene 's decision to represent great britain
bedene , who moved to the uk seven years ago and lives in london , represented britain for the first time at the weekend , and he qualified for the main draw of the casablanca open .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather to stay fine
text: the weather in london will stay fine , with clear spells and light winds into the evening .
it will become locally chilly by dawn where clear skies persist the longest , while some coastal areas around the thames estuary may develop low cloud and areas of fog .
minimum temperature : 3c ( 37f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: easter egg hunt for lemurs
text: lemurs at london zoo in regent 's park have a new home , which the zoo marked with an
the animals did not crack open a chocolate egg , however , rather a more health-conscious papier mache shell filled with steamed vegetables .
yum .

documents.title: problems heading away from london
text: there are problems heading away from london this evening on the a12 .
at junction 13 , ingatestone , a lorry has crashed into the central reservation and is blocking the road .
queues are back to the m25 at the junction 28 brook street roundabout .
delays continue in central london following the holborn fire .
london buses tell us they 've got delays of up to half an hour and it 's slow on the strand and around trafalgar square .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: boat race preparations
text: the cambridge university women 's boat crew has been practicing on the river thames ahead of the boat race on saturday .
it will be the first time that the women 's boat race will take place on the same stretch of water and on the same day as the men 's event .
on 12 april the newton women 's boat race will start at 16:50 ahead of the

documents.title: if the shoe fits
text: dozens of burglars in london have been caught thanks to a revolutionary police scanner that matches the footprints of suspects to marks left at crime scenes , reports the
a pilot scheme in north-west london has led to the arrest of 76 burglars in the last 12 months , the newspaper said .

documents.title: death in wembley
text: a man with injuries to his chest has died in wembley ,
officers were called by the london ambulance service at 11:15 to the man in his vehicle at green hill .
the death is being treated as sus and is under investigation by the homicide team .
there will be a post-mortem in due course .

documents.title: son 'told to lower ' father 's tribute flag
text: a retired policeman is shocked after bromley council told him to take down a flagpole dedicated to his late father , reports the

kevin coleville , 57 , from st john 's road in petts wood , has flown the union jack flag outside his house for a number of years and recently put up a second pole flying the royal navy flag in memory of his late father , the newspaper said .

documents.title: army sergeant denies sex abuse charges
text: an army sergeant accused of sexually abusing female recruits has denied the charges .
edwin mee , 45 , of tavistock road , croydon , south london , allegedly targeted 11 victims aged between 15 and 25 on military bases .
the scottish soldier denied 17 counts of sexual assault , three rapes and one count of assault by penetration at

documents.title: parish : 'no plans to sell ' crystal palace
text: crystal palace co-chairman steve parish has
the eagles were linked with a takeover by american billionaire josh harris late last year .
`` the only reason for us to get money in is to improve the infrastructure .
there is no rush and we are in a good place .
if it happens , it happens , '' parish said .
author: BBC Sport

and after a second morning of sunshine , how long will it last ?
we have a full weather forecast at 13:30 .

documents.title: family affair for marathon challenge
text: a father and two sons will be tackling the london marathon later this month in aid of children 's charities
dean mottershead , 55 , from macclesfield , will be running the 26.2 mile course alongside his sons nick , 25 , and jon , 23 .
jon said : `` it 's going to be even more special doing it with my brother and my old man .
it really is a once-in-a-lifetime event for our family as my dad will be hanging up his marathon shoes after this one . ''

documents.title: liverpool street train delays
text: delays to and from london liverpool street stations are expected until 12:00 following a signalling problem at the station .
commuters are being warned to expect up to 30 minutes of delays .
get up to date travel information on

documents.title: woman dies after sutton fire
text: a woman has died following a fire at a flat in south-west london this morning .
around a quarter of the second floor flat in the six storey block was left damaged by the fire .
the cause of the fire is under investigation .

documents.title: holloway fire displaces residents
text: a blaze which left dozens of holloway residents in temporary accommodation over easter is being investigated by london fire brigade , reports the
the newspaper said the fire engulfed the roof of rollit house , a block of 24 homes , with 37 people having to evacuated from the building .

documents.title: woman with dementia goes missing
text: a 76-year-old
margaret jean willing was last seen at 18:00 yesterday when she left an address in muswell hill , where she is being cared for by a friend .
she is 4ft 5in tall of slight build , with blonde hair worn in a ponytail and was last seen wearing a black knee length puffa coat with brown boots , carrying a black cloth bag , police say .

documents.title: women in space
text: north london schoolgirls will
the girls , at parliament hill school , will interview women working in the space programme and the world of science .
they will also go through archives at the women 's library in holborn to find out how women conquered discrimination in the early days of the us space programme , the paper says .
author: Ham & High
Newspaper

documents.title: voters ' concerns in ealing
text: she hears about voters ' concerns , including the nhs , education and housing for young people , in the constituency where labour needs a swing of 3.9 % to win .

documents.title: homeless families in temporary brent b & bs
text: in 2014 , the london borough of brent had 77 families with children living in temporary hotel accommodation for more than six weeks , reports
according to the children 's charity barnardo 's , the housing and benefits system is failing homeless children stuck in brent b & bs , the local newspaper said .

documents.title: crystal palace 2 - 1 man city
text: glenn murray put crystal palace ahead with a tap-in from close range before jason puncheon fired in a free-kick from the edge of the box .
yaya toure 's fierce strike pulled a goal back for fourth-placed city but palace held on to move up to 11th .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: gas supplies restored after holborn fire
text: the
in a statement , the national grid said after working all of sunday `` engineers now need confirmation from the building owner 's structural engineer that the final piece of work can continue '' .
they added engineers will return today to complete the laying of the service pipe and restore the gas supply .

documents.title: rail line re-opens
text: the rail line between reading and paddington has re-opened this morning , after four days of major engineering work replacing sections of track around reading and slough stations .
however , there currently remains a revised service on
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: a12 blackwall tunnel approach closed
text: the a12 blackwall tunnel approach in poplar is closed causing long delays southbound between bow interchange and blackwall tunnel , because of a serious accident .
diversions are in operation for bus routes 309 and 323 and route 488 will not call at tesco , at bow .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fine and dry day
text: a chilly start but another fine and dry day across london with sunny spells .
top temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Weather, London
